projects.title: Shipping Container Monitoring Cum Tracking System Using GPS & GSM
projects.description: The Shipping Container Monitoring cum Tracking System leverages GPS and GSM technology to provide real-time tracking of container locations. It also monitors environmental conditions such as temperature and humidity inside the container, ensuring the safety and quality of transported goods. The system transmits location data and sensor readings to users via SMS or an online platform, enhancing logistics efficiency and cargo security.

projects.title: Invisible Security system using embedded system
projects.description: This system enhances security with discreet monitoring, minimizing the risk of intruder detection. It provides real-time alerts for immediate response to unauthorized access. Its autonomous and customizable design ensures reliable, low-maintenance protection across various environments.
